comments:
Description:
NPE when open ScriptedDataSourceExampleAfter sample report
Build number:2.2.2.v20071126

Steps to reproduce:
1. Select Window->Show View->Report Examples
2. Select Scripting->Scripted Data Source.
3. Select the report and click Open.

Expected result:
Open the report in a new project.

Actual result:
NPE and fail to open the report.

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.samples.ide.action.IDEOpenSampleReportAction.run(IDEOpenSampleReportAction.java:171)

Please check if this works in 2.2.1, if it works, we need fix in 2.2.2; otherwise, we will only keep the fix in 2.3.
Fixed it. It's the same bug as 206420, I had fixed it in 2.3, now fixed it in 2.2.
*** Bug 211558 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
